definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Qi county in Hebi 鶴壁|鹤壁[He4 bi4], Henan
Qibin district of Hebi city 鶴壁市|鹤壁市[He4 bi4 shi4], Henan
Qibin district of Hebi city 鶴壁市|鹤壁市[He4 bi4 shi4], Henan
(slang) (Tw) to be checking out the hotties
pinyin: yan3 jing5 chi1 bing1 qi2 lin2

sentences.english: Qishui waves rolling in, spray wet the car curtain .
sentences.chinese: 淇水波濤滾滾，水花打溼了車上的布幔。

sentences.english: How many times we enjoyed ice-creams in the snow with warm fogs breathing out.
sentences.chinese: 曾幾何時，我們在雪天裏呼着熱氣喫冰淇凌。

sentences.english: My wife is not a big fan of pumpkin pie so for her, we also have ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 我妻子不喜歡喫南瓜派，所以她喫冰淇林做甜點。

sentences.english: Weng Ziqi is not at home. She is in Lingtong School.
sentences.chinese: 翁子淇不在家，她在靈通學校了。

sentences.english: It was nice that Ethan's uncle and auntie came to see us too.
sentences.chinese: 梓淇的叔叔阿姨也都一起來了。

sentences.english: Last weekend, Ethan helped granny make cheese cake.
sentences.chinese: 上個週末，郭梓淇幫奶奶做奶酪蛋糕。

sentences.english: All the artwork can be eaten since no dyestuff is used, said Ju.
sentences.chinese: 桔多淇表示，因爲她沒有用顏料，她的作品都能喫。

sentences.english: Spoon meringue onto the foil, using the marked circle as a guide.
sentences.chinese: 將麥淇淋用勺放入錫紙中，錫紙圈作爲標準。

sentences.english: Children like having ice-cream in summer.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天，孩子們喜歡喫冰淇凌。

sentences.english: Ethan's granny and grandad came to visit us yesterday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 梓淇的爺爺奶奶昨天下午來看我們。

definition: (phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]
